    • Constructor Detail

      • GridBuilder

        protected GridBuilder()
        This creates a flat grid, with dimensions 10x10 and no obstacles. No lightGrenades or any other object. This is mainly used for testing purposes.

      • GridBuilder

        public GridBuilder(int hSize,
           int vSize)
        Creates a new GridBuilder with parameters to create a new grid. This constructor will place random Walls, LightGrenades, identityDiscs and Teleports according to the constraints.
        Parameters:
        hSize - The horizontal size of the grid this gridBuilder will build.
        vSize - The vertical size of the grid this gridBuilder will build.

      • GridBuilder

        protected GridBuilder(int hSize,
           int vSize,
           java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate>> walls,
           java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> lightGrenades,
           java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> identityDisks,
           java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> teleports,
           Coordinate chargedIdentityDisk)
        Creates a new GridBuilder with parameters to create a new grid. Currently the given coordinates will be checked on the usual constraints! Keep this in mind when building test grids.
        Parameters:
        hSize - The horizontal size of the grid this gridBuilder will build.
        vSize - The vertical size of the grid this gridBuilder will build.
        walls - A list of sequences of coordinates where walls should be placed.
        lightGrenades - A list of coordinates that should contain a LightGrenade.
        identityDisks - A list of coordinates that should contain a identityDisk
        teleports - A list of coordinates that should contain a teleport.

    • Method Detail

      • getGrid

        @Basic
public Grid getGrid()
        Returns the grid. This method should only be called when the gridBuilder has done all his work.

      • randomLocations

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> randomLocations(GridConstraint constraint)

      • chargedIdentityDiskLocation

        protected Coordinate chargedIdentityDiskLocation()
        Suggest a coordinate for the Charged Disk Location
        Returns:
        A coordinate equally far away from each player

      • randomWallLocations

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate>> randomWallLocations(GridConstraint constraint)
        Finds a random list of sequences of coordinates that follow the given constraint.
        Parameters:
        constraint - The constraint which is taken into account.
        Returns:
        A list of sequences of coordinates.

      • randomChargedIdentityDiskLocation

        protected Coordinate randomChargedIdentityDiskLocation()

      • placeLightGrenade

        protected void placeLightGrenade(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> coordinates,
                     GridConstraint constraint)
        Place light grenades at the the given coordinates, in respect with the given constraint.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The coordinates where to place the light grenades
        constraint - The constraint for placing light grenades

      • placeIdentityDisk

        protected void placeIdentityDisk(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> coordinates,
                     GridConstraint constraint)
        Place identity disks on the given coordinates, in respect with the given constraint
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The coordinates where to place the identity disks
        constraint - The constraint for placing identity disks

              GridConstraint constraint)
        Place walls on the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The coordinates where to place the walls
        constraint - The constraint for placing walls;

      • getCoordinatesOfWalls

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getCoordinatesOfWalls(java.util.ArrayList<Wall> walls)
        Returns the coordinates of the given walls on the grid of this GridBuilder.
        Parameters:
        walls - The walls of which the coordinates are wanted.
        Returns:
        The coordinates covered by the walls.

      • satisfiesConstraint

        protected boolean satisfiesConstraint(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> coordinates,
                          GridConstraint constraint)
        Check whether the given list of coordinates satisfies the given constraint
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The list of coordinates to be checked
        constraint - The constraint to be satisfied
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given list satisfies the given constraint
